categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Sylen Kempar was a male Sith Pureblood who held the title of Sith Lord within the reconstituted Sith Empire. During the Battle of Corellia in the Galactic War, he was stationed at the Coronet Spaceport on the planet Corellia, where he shared his knowledge with fellow Sith Warriors.
Lord Sylen Kempar appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a class trainer for the Sith Warrior class on Corellia.
